evidence.title: README (segment 3)
evidence.excerpt: **Deploy AI agents in your own data center or VPC and retain complete data security & control.**

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: HelixML is an enterprise-grade platform for building and deploying AI agents with support for RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), API calling, vision, and multi-provider LLM support. Build and deploy LLM applications by writing a simple [`helix.yaml`](https://docs.helixml.tech/helix/develop/getting-started/) configuration file.

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: Our intelligent GPU scheduler packs models efficiently into available GPU memory and dynamically loads and unloads models based on demand, optimizing resource utilization.

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: ### ü§ñ AI Agents - **Easy-to-use Web UI** for agent interaction and management - **Session-based architecture** with pause/resume capabilities - **Multi-step reasoning** with tool orchestration - **Memory management** for context-aware interactions - **Support for multiple LLM providers** (OpenAI, Anthropic, and local models)

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: ### üõ†Ô∏è Skills and Tools - **REST API integration** with OpenAPI schema support - **MCP (Model Context Protocol) server** compatibility - **GPTScript integration** for advanced scripting - **OAuth token management** for secure third-party access - **Custom tool development** with flexible SDK

## What's Changed * why is the startup script failing? by @lukemarsden in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1669 * fix: use clean EFI vars template instead of downloading from R2 by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1671 * fix: show provider icons on onboarding by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1673 * Feature/enforce limits by @nessie993 in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1675 * fix: convert version upgrade banner to floating snackbar by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1677 * feat(kodit): bump to 1.0.0 by @philwinder in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1678 * fix: navigate into project after onboarding by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1676 * fix: apply Finder styling live during DMG build by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1670 * fix: VM update detection and user-consented download flow by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1679 * fix: remove read-only mount on sandbox-images volume by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1618 * Fix GPU encoder error messages, admin session info, pin Zed build image by @lukemarsden in https://github.com/helix‚Ä¶

evidence.title: 2.6.3-rc5
evidence.excerpt: 2.6.3-rc5 ## What's Changed * feat: combined app+VM update flow by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1699 * fix: use ephemeral EFI vars instead of persistent file by @lukemarsden in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1700 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helixml/helix/compare/2.6.3-rc4...2.6.3-rc5

evidence.title: 2.6.3-rc4
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * Add Slack notifications for beta waitlist signups by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1695 * fix: prevent Finder windows during CI DMG builds by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1693 * fix: stop bundling/copying efi_vars.fd from build machine by @chocobar in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1698 * fix: delete stale efi_vars.fd during VM disk upgrade by @lukemarsden in https://github.com/helixml/helix/pull/1696 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/helixml/helix/compare/2.6.3-rc3...2.6.3-rc4
